places_with_reviews.name: Hyatt Place Bharuch
address: Hyatt Place Bharuch College Road, Old Nh 8, opp. Svmit College, Friends Colony, Bholav, Bharuch, Gujarat 392002, India

reviews.text:
My experience was really really outstanding.
The rooms , service, and location was awesome and everyone was well mannered and educated.
They always greet us with smile no matter what is the time . The restaurant was lavish and there were many varieties of food and it was 24/7 open .
They provide spa , gym , swimming, games room for small kids .
The View from swimming pool was awesome specially in night .
They celebrate each and every festival and everyone was very humble whether they were guards to the director.
I'll recommend this to everyone if you want to feel like classy , lavish or luxurious.

The menu featured a diverse range of cuisines, skillfully prepared with fresh, high-quality ingredients. The chefs' creativity shone through in every dish, making each meal a memorable journey for the taste buds. The attentive and knowledgeable staff further enhanced the dining experience, providing excellent recommendations and ensuring impeccable service.
The hotel's ambiance is a perfect blend of sophistication and comfort. The attention to detail in the decor, lighting, and overall design creates a welcoming and luxurious atmosphere. Whether enjoying a meal in the elegant dining area or relaxing in the beautifully appointed rooms, the ambiance at Hyatt adds a touch of magic to the entire stay. The thoughtful use of space and design elements contributes to a sense of tranquility, making it an ideal retreat for both business and leisure travelers.

The best 5* hotel in Bharuch and the service was above and beyond. Perfect location with everything being so close by.
The staff are extremely helpful and a hotel where you wouldn't want to step out as it's so clean and so peaceful and also have a gym and pool.
They have an amazing restaurant with professional staff working there.
The food is so fresh and tasty and so many options to choose from.

5 stars all the way. Large spacious rooms. Spanking new. Super clean bathrooms. The breakfast spread is both Indian and continental. Dinner was uninteresting. The service in the restaurant was fabulous. Polite and attentive. A great place to stay in Bharuch. Very close to Bharuch station. If starting for the industrial zones in the morning, start early to avoid traffic jams just outside the room. Liked the place

Amazing hotel, this is what Bharuch has needed for a long time. I've visited after 10 years but knowing there is this standard of hotel here it makes it very attractive to come again very soon.

Can't fault the facilities nor the service provided by all the staff, especially the security staff Hetal and Sanjay who welcome you to the hotel. They provide a very warm welcome with a big smile, always have time for a conversation and are humorous, they will make you feel 'garden garden'!

Have to mention the food and restaurant, not only the breakfast but all the food really is worth trying and is very reasonably priced - hats off to the chefs!

places_with_reviews.name: Regenta Central Harimangla, Bharuch

reviews.text: We went for dinner. Food was fabulous. Value for money. Service was good

Beautiful hotel...
Don't have non veg here as it was upset ur stomach, which I experienced.
Nice place, good ambience and super service. Can do better in terms of cleanliness.

Front desk receptionists too arrogant, they don't have good manners either.

Restaurant staff too good and happy to help nature. Buffet breakfast so-so.,not served hot.

places_with_reviews.name: Ginger Bharuch
address: 1, Railway Station Rd, Opp. Patel Super Market, Moficer Jin Compound, Bharuch, Gujarat 392001, India

reviews.text:
I dined at the GINGER in-hotel restaurant and while my experience was an average, Food was well prepared and presented.
The atmosphere was nice and the service was decent, but the food was a bit lackluster. I ordered the Some starter and main course while it was cooked to my liking, it lacked flavor and seasoning. There were also nothing special.
The prices were a bit high for the quality of the food.
Overall, it was an okay dining experience.

Stayed here during a business trip for a couple nights.

The property is located on a busy road. The entrance is a little confusing if you are visiting for the first time. They have open parking for guests which is not very great but something is better than nothing.

The rooms are neat and clean. They have a decent gym and it is locked most of the time. You have to request them to open it up if you want to use it.

The restaurant offered good options for both buffet and a la carte. I really loved the food.

All in all a decent place to stay in Bharuch.

This property is located on the main station road of Bharuch, but amidst the chaotic environment, it is quite well-maintained. The staff is cooperative, helpful and generous. The rooms are clean and spacious. The property also has a restaurant which is beautiful and has unique sitting spaces. The food is also delicious and has a variety, no less than any other locations of this brand. Overall, a really nice getaway which was totally worth it!

It was overall a very bad experience Ginger a brand everyone trust but sorry to say they don't keep any promises

Rooms are full of mosquitos. Hotel staff are least bothered to provide anything to reduce it.

They don't have iron to provide to customers if you request more they will provide you a dirty and bad quality iron which will spoil your clothes

In. Breakfast area they don't provide services

I don't know whether I should to recommend this property to anyone or not

Our stay was horrible we don't ask anyone to stay at this property

Management and hall staff is not up to the mark.room acs are not working.

We had a great stay experience. The AC wasn't working very well for our room however, the service was decent. The rooms were clean although not very well- litup. The location is really good and greatly accessible from city and  station. The food at the hotel was very average. However, the vicinity in which the hotel is located has many great food options nearby at walking distance. The staff was polite and professional. Overall stay was good.

places_with_reviews.name: Rang Lords Inn Bharuch
address: R S No, Over Bridge, 79 A, ABC Chokdi, near Nandelav Road, Bholav, Bharuch, Gujarat 392001, India

reviews.text: Amazing place for food n stay. Food quality is upscale served with great hospitality. Parking facilities are free. Conference facilities are upscale. Love this place. Highly recommend for those travellers are going to join new express way  Delhi to Mumbai from Bharuch side.

I stayed there for a day with my family as I had to attend a function near by. Excellent stay and total value for money. The Rooms were spacious, clean and equipped.The room service food (veg/Non Veg) was good, both taste wise and quantity wise. The staff were polite and prompt. Mr Shivraj from front desk was really helpful and cooperative as were the other members in the staff. They had baby chair for my toddler in the restaurant which was another plus point. The breakfast spread was also sufficient. Will surely recommend if you are visiting the area and looking for a place to stay.

Good property with good room and washroom. Buffet breakfast has large options of South Indian, North Indian as well as continental Dishes with fruits and juices. The food quality was great. The staff os very helpful and courteous.
Overall a great stay.

Front desk employees were very helpful, they were kind and polite as well.
They treated me in the best way they could.
I guess I remember there names too, PRIYANKA , SHIVRAJ and NIKITA.
Thank you guys for making my stay comfortable and wonderful.
Hope i will see you again.

The rooms were revamped and very good. Service level is excellent. Very hospitable staff.

Restaurant food was good. Clean washrooms. Even small issues which persisted were solved by the staff such as Hot Water Constraints.

Highly recommend for short stay.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Shalimar
address: Railway Station Rd, Soneri Mahal, Bharuch, Gujarat 392001, India

reviews.text:
The rooms are tiny yet comfortable. However there was a lot of noise from the floor above of people dragging furniture till late at night. I think there was an activity hall above the room where they used to arrange furniture for the day ahead at night.

One thing to watch out for is that they have a limited breakfast, which was not told to us at the dining hall. So make sure to clarify with the server. The breakfast is also not very good so better to avoid it altogether!
Personally I like the food never stayed in rooms just enjoy the afternoon fixed Gujarati thali .. best

Introduction:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Shalimar Hotel for a weekend getaway with my family. Our stay dates were from July 15th to July 17th, and overall, it was a delightful experience.

Check-In Experience:
The check-in process was smooth and hassle-free. The reception staff welcomed us warmly and efficiently handled the check-in formalities. They provided us with all the necessary information about the hotel's facilities and nearby attractions.

Room and Accommodation:
Our room was spacious and well-maintained. The cleanliness was commendable, and the housekeeping staff did an excellent job of keeping it tidy throughout our stay. The beds were comfortable, ensuring a good night's sleep after long days of exploration.

Service and Staff:
The hotel staff were incredibly courteous and attentive to our needs. They were quick to assist us with any inquiries and always wore a friendly smile. Their professionalism added to the overall positive experience during our stay.

Dining Options:
The dining options at Shalimar Hotel were quite impressive. We enjoyed the delicious breakfast buffet with a variety of choices to cater to different tastes. The on-site restaurant offered delectable dishes, and the room service was prompt and efficient.

Facilities and Amenities:
Shalimar Hotel provided a range of facilities that added value to our stay. The gym was well-equipped, allowing us to maintain our fitness routine. The swimming pool was clean and inviting, providing a refreshing break from the summer heat.

Location:
The hotel's location was convenient, situated in close proximity to several popular tourist attractions and shopping centers. It was easy to access public transportation, which made exploring the city hassle-free.

Value for Money:
Considering the quality of service, comfortable accommodation, and convenient location, the Shalimar Hotel offered good value for the price paid.

Cleanliness and Hygiene:
The hotel maintained a high standard of cleanliness and hygiene throughout the premises. The common areas, as well as our room, were well-kept and sanitary.

Overall Experience:
Our overall experience at Shalimar Hotel was excellent. The friendly staff, comfortable rooms, and great amenities contributed to making our stay memorable. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the area and would gladly return for another stay in the future.
Worst experience even I paid for breakfast but still they have charged extra for breakfast and staff directly entered in room without knowing door
I'm belong to punjab but my daughter like Gujarati khanna.. Shalimar hotel food very testi and resealable price ..i like Shalimar hotel..thxx u so much..

places_with_reviews.name: HOTEL ASHISH
address: ABC Chowkdi, Old National Highway, No. 8, Bholav, Bharuch, Gujarat 392015, India

reviews.text: Food is of good quality and taste. They have renowated the hotel and interior is good. However they have still Indian style washroom without jet spray which they should change. Rates are slightly higher as compared to other hotels.

I have visited here for the first time and the experience was better than I was expecting. Nice staff, very helpful. I would consider the fare reasonable. Have not tried the food yet but I have a positive thoughts for the food as well.
Located at best location in Bharuch it is easily approachable. It serves good and tasty food. Service is super fast and staff is humble.

Recently I stayed here for 1 night. Nice hotel to stay as well as location accessible to Bharuch Station and highway towards Dahej Saykha. One more amazing thing the Restaurant they have with amazing vegetarian food. If anyone travelling bharuch must recommend this hotel for food as well as stay.

Food is good. Taste is good.
Staff is little arrogant and foolish

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Apex
address: 1, Vaibhav Arcade, Mipco Chowkdi, GNFC Twp, GIDC, Bharuch, Gujarat 392015, India

reviews.text: Good hotel. Near ABC circle. Food quality and brakefast good. Room are neat and clean. Big size room.
Rooms are simple but clean. Restaurant service is fast test is good but  don't have long list of items in menu.

3-Star service. Spacious rooms. Reasonably priced for the big room and a decent bathroom space.
It was an Executive room.
Do not think it is a hotel, this just a budget lodge . So do not keep you expectations high.

It has many option like delux etc rooms are clean and spacious. Toilets are also well maintained package includes dinner and morning breakfast there are many variety available for breakfast. Check buttons of the toilet we had problem with button. AC makes noise and there are mosquitos inside room good knight also installed in room check out timing is noon 12

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Comfort Bharuch
address: Sai Dham Complex, ABC Cir, Near Rohini Nagar, Bholav, Bharuch, Gujarat 392001, India

reviews.text:
Don't book a room here.. I repeat don't book a room here... I paid ₹2700/- for this cheap quality room in the name of a 3 star hotel.
The walls are peeling out, the bathroom tap is rusty and dirty, the toilet is so dirty, hygiene issues. Poor room quality. Not at all recommend to book this hotel. Go for Regenta or Hyatt.

Hotel is in prime location of Bharuch. You get many eatable shops at a walking distance near to Hotel. Parking of hotel is not specific to hotel however, they have taken space in adjacent society to park our vehicles. Entrance of hotel is not good at all however once you get out from lift and enter to hotels reception it is another world.
Rooms are clear and okayish type. Basic necessities were available. No kettle, No coffee or tea pouch. No Cable. Dental kit is available on request at free of cost.
Food is bit costly as compared to normal menu items.

Overall it is good to stay

After we paid 2500 RS. Charge for 1 night hold we never expected mosquito in room and not Protection also in room  like All out but here available only agarbatti for mosquito. This is very bed I not like it. I suggest to hotelier that it's need to improve room facilities compare to charge.
Very nit and clean Hotel. Staff is very supportive. Food is also good. Good hotel to stay in budget.

Had to stay over night during my trip room no 210,AC swing was not working and the exhaust fan in washroom was making lot of noise,we pay for comfort and services which is basic and right for the customer,we went for dinner at 10 pm ,the guy said it's closed for dinner,so had to go out for dinner.The management needs to take care of small issues on a serious note,Drivers accomodation facility is not available,which I beleive is basic facility overall ok staying experience. Lot of improvements required.,Front office staff Tousif was very courteous enough

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Apple Inn
address: Shalimar Complex, B/H thakur Restaurant, Railway Station Rd, Old Town, Bharuch, Gujarat 392001, India

reviews.text:
One of the best Hotels to book in BHARUCH - city where you do not have much choices of hotels in normal price segment.

✅ Staff Behavior Good, Service is good

✅ Booking without food is recommended, Zomato Swiggy is allowed in hotel.

Recommended….

It's quite near to Bharuch railway station. It's amazing experience with the hotel service and their co operation.
I stayed here for 2 days.
Staff is very humble and quick service of food.

Thank you team for your good service and co operation.
Good rooms and service. i had a great time here . 1 minus point is there is very less parking space for car and  bike as well.

Nice place to eat. the main ingredients were missing from the ordered dish. Overall okay.
The staff was friendly.

A very mouthwatering taste of each and every gravy. Specially the paneer gravy dish is very amazing. Also I have ordered Panjabi and Gujarati thaali in which Gujarati thaali comes without dish(thaali) packing but it was more in quantity and Punjabi thaali comes in thaali sealed pack and lesser quantity than Gujarati thaali. But both thaali tase was good as it contains different varieties and flavours.

I really recommend this to people who only eats vegetarian food and it's very good option for them.

reviews.text:
room 11x13 feet, decent size bath. clean.
the hotel could not fix a leaking tap throughout my 3 day stay.
extremely hard water and soap not effective at all. all fittings are green with sulphate deposits.
hot water system is very inefficient as you have to open tap and let water drain for at least 10 min before you start getting hot water.
food is veg only but decent pricing and good qty and hence 3star.

I had a good experience in this hotel,

It was a good two weak stay,
Good breakfast facilities and lunch as well dinner.

Dinner facilities very fantastic could area outside.
Room services and all services are good.

service, very near to Railway station, the only drawback was the price i.e 1900 rs per night. That was a bit over for me. But that's what you get in bharuch as you won't get better quality at cheaper rates.
Worst hotel& restaurant service I ever experienced there. I recommend not to go there, because they don't have good staff, good food , and the behaviour of manager is also worst.

Hotel Corona is very near to Railway station, only walkable distance. It is little costlier. You can include or exclude complimentary breakfast from your package. Breakfast will be of small buffet type with readymade items as well as other items like Sada Dosa, masala dosa etc,.
